alert.note: Alert for Elk; McKean; Potter; Warren (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 5:22PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY RAIN AND SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF MCKEAN...WARREN... POTTER...AND ELK COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy rain changing to snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 521 PM EDT, a band of heavy rain changing to snow was along a cold front extending from 11 miles southwest of Dansville to 11 miles northeast of Warren to near Granville and moving east at 60 MPH. This includes the following highways... Route 6 from Irvine to west of Coudersport. Route 62 from south of Tidioute to North Warren. Route 219 from Johnsonburg to the New York border. State Road 46 from Smethport to Farmers Valley. State Road 59 from Warren to Smethport. State Road 66 from Russell City to Kane. State Road 446 from Farmers Valley to the New York border. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
